Class LayoutStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jailer.util.LayoutStorage

  • public class LayoutStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and restores graph layout.
    Author:
    Ralf Wisser

      static boolean enabled
      If storage is disabled, no persistent layout is available.
